#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int Encore_Aux(int n)
{
	int s=0,temp=n;
	while(n>=10)
	{
		s=s+n%10;
		n=n/10;
	}
	s=s+n;
	return (s+temp);
}

int Encore_Finder(int n)
{	
	int i;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		if(Encore_Aux(i)==n)
		{
			break;
		}
	}
	return i;
}

int main()
{
	int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		if(Encore_Finder(n)>=n)
		cout<<"NONE"<<endl;
		else cout<<Encore_Finder(n)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
